languages.text: "Ткачи провели их тропою инакой. Тебе же надлежало свершить шаг веры — стать кровью флагмана удел твой лишь, Домин. Ни к чему тех, кто за тобой идет следом, испытывать, если владыка их уже несет это бремя".

"The spinners guided them along a different trail. You had to take the step, for only you were meant to become the flagship's blood, Domin. There was no reason to test the faith of those who follow you, for this burden was for their {mf|lord|lady} to bear."
languages.original_text: "Ткачи провели их тропою инакой. Тебе же надлежало свершить шаг веры — стать кровью флагмана удел твой лишь, Домин. Ни к чему тех, кто за тобой идет следом, испытывать, если владыка их уже несет это бремя".

traits.locale_text: "The spinners guided them along a different trail. You had to take the step, for only you were meant to become the flagship's blood, Domin. There was no reason to test the faith of those who follow you, for this burden was for their {mf|lord|lady} to bear."

"The spinners guided them along a different trail. You had to take the step, for only you were meant to become the flagship's blood, Domin. There was no reason to test the faith of those who follow you, for this burden was for their {mf|lord|lady} to bear."

"The spinners guided them along a different trail. You had to take the step, for only you were meant to become the flagship's blood, Domin. There was no reason to test the faith of those who follow you, for this burden was for their {mf|lord|lady} to bear."

"The spinners guided them along a different trail. You had to take the step, for only you were meant to become the flagship's blood, Domin. There was no reason to test the faith of those who follow you, for this burden was for their {mf|lord|lady} to bear."

"The spinners guided them along a different trail. You had to take the step, for only you were meant to become the flagship's blood, Domin. There was no reason to test the faith of those who follow you, for this burden was for their {mf|lord|lady} to bear."

"The spinners guided them along a different trail. You had to take the step, for only you were meant to become the flagship's blood, Domin. There was no reason to test the faith of those who follow you, for this burden was for their {mf|lord|lady} to bear."

languages.text: «Los tejedores les han guiado por otra senda. Usted tenía que dar el paso, pues solo usted puede convertirse en la sangre de la nave insignia, Domin. No había motivo para poner a prueba la fe de quienes l{mf|e|a} siguen, pues tal carga solo corresponde a su señor{mf||a}».
languages.original_text: "The spinners guided them along a different trail. You had to take the step, for only you were meant to become the flagship's blood, Domin. There was no reason to test the faith of those who follow you, for this burden was for their {mf|lord|lady} to bear."

traits.locale_text: «Los tejedores les han guiado por otra senda. Usted tenía que dar el paso, pues solo usted puede convertirse en la sangre de la nave insignia, Domin. No había motivo para poner a prueba la fe de quienes l{mf|e|a} siguen, pues tal carga solo corresponde a su señor{mf||a}».

languages.text: 「スピナー は彼らを別の道へと導きました。ドミン、あなただけが旗艦の血となるのです。あなたに従う者たちの信仰を試す理由はありません。この重荷は彼らの陛下が背負うべきなのです」
languages.original_text: "The spinners guided them along a different trail. You had to take the step, for only you were meant to become the flagship's blood, Domin. There was no reason to test the faith of those who follow you, for this burden was for their {mf|lord|lady} to bear."

traits.locale_text: 「スピナー は彼らを別の道へと導きました。ドミン、あなただけが旗艦の血となるのです。あなたに従う者たちの信仰を試す理由はありません。この重荷は彼らの陛下が背負うべきなのです」

languages.text: “织网者引导他们，通过另一条路进入了神殿。您必须要迈出这一步，因为只有您才有权成为旗舰之血，秘者。至于那些追随您的人，我们不需要考验他们的信念，因为这沉重的负担要压在他们主人的肩上。”
languages.original_text: "The spinners guided them along a different trail. You had to take the step, for only you were meant to become the flagship's blood, Domin. There was no reason to test the faith of those who follow you, for this burden was for their {mf|lord|lady} to bear."

traits.locale_text: “织网者引导他们，通过另一条路进入了神殿。您必须要迈出这一步，因为只有您才有权成为旗舰之血，秘者。至于那些追随您的人，我们不需要考验他们的信念，因为这沉重的负担要压在他们主人的肩上。”

languages.text: "Die Spinner haben sie einen anderen Weg entlanggeführt. Ihr musstet den Schritt machen, denn nur Euch war bestimmt, das Blut des Flaggschiffs zu werden, Domin. Es bestand kein Grund, den Glauben Eurer Gefolgschaft zu prüfen, denn diese Bürde kam nur {mf|ihrem Lord|ihrer Lady} zu."
languages.original_text: "The spinners guided them along a different trail. You had to take the step, for only you were meant to become the flagship's blood, Domin. There was no reason to test the faith of those who follow you, for this burden was for their {mf|lord|lady} to bear."

traits.locale_text: "Die Spinner haben sie einen anderen Weg entlanggeführt. Ihr musstet den Schritt machen, denn nur Euch war bestimmt, das Blut des Flaggschiffs zu werden, Domin. Es bestand kein Grund, den Glauben Eurer Gefolgschaft zu prüfen, denn diese Bürde kam nur {mf|ihrem Lord|ihrer Lady} zu."

languages.text: « Les tisseurs leur ont fait emprunter un chemin différent. De votre côté, vous deviez en passer par là, car vous {mf|seul|seule} êtes {mf|destiné|destinée} à devenir le sang du vaisseau amiral, Domin. Nous n'avions aucune raison d'éprouver la foi de ceux qui vous suivent, car ce fardeau incombait à leur {mf|seigneur|maîtresse}, et à personne d'autre. »
languages.original_text: "The spinners guided them along a different trail. You had to take the step, for only you were meant to become the flagship's blood, Domin. There was no reason to test the faith of those who follow you, for this burden was for their {mf|lord|lady} to bear."

traits.locale_text: « Les tisseurs leur ont fait emprunter un chemin différent. De votre côté, vous deviez en passer par là, car vous {mf|seul|seule} êtes {mf|destiné|destinée} à devenir le sang du vaisseau amiral, Domin. Nous n'avions aucune raison d'éprouver la foi de ceux qui vous suivent, car ce fardeau incombait à leur {mf|seigneur|maîtresse}, et à personne d'autre. »

languages.text: "Dokurlar, onlara farklı bir yol gösterdi. Sizin bu adımı atmanız gerekiyordu. Çünkü yalnızca siz, sancak gemisinin kanı hâline gelebilirsiniz Domin. Peşinizden gelenlerin inancını teste tabi tutmaya gerek yoktu. Çünkü bu yükü {mf|lordları|leydileri} taşımalıdır."
languages.original_text: "The spinners guided them along a different trail. You had to take the step, for only you were meant to become the flagship's blood, Domin. There was no reason to test the faith of those who follow you, for this burden was for their {mf|lord|lady} to bear."
